snippet.title: Codename: Terranova - How to play the game
snippet.description:
Codename: Terranova is out now! Buy the game on Steam:
https://bit.ly/300etST

What you need to play Codename: Terranova
- A single copy of the game
- A voice connection
- A smart device (or a PC)
- A friend

How to play Codename: Terranova
- Download the game from Steam and play the game
- As the Agent, select Play and choose a mission
- Communicate the on-screen code to the Operator
- As the Operator, go to Terranova Operation Center System (at terranova-app.acgames.it) and click Connect to the Agent
- Insert your nickname and the code the Agent gave you and click Connect.
- Play the game!
